aws_app_cookie_stickiness_policy.description: Provides an application cookie stickiness policy, which allows an ELB to wed its stickiness cookie to a cookie generated by your application.

name.description: The name of the stickiness policy.

load_balancer.description: The name of load balancer to which the policy

lb_port.description: The load balancer port to which the policy

cookie_name.description: The application cookie whose lifetime the ELB's cookie should follow.

name.description: The name of the stickiness policy.

load_balancer.description: The name of load balancer to which the policy is attached.

lb_port.description: The load balancer port to which the policy is applied.

cookie_name.description: The application cookie whose lifetime the ELB's cookie should follow.
